preface.title: Preface
preface.para: If you're reading this then you are now an officer (or should be) in the WVU ACM or FSG.
Fill this spot with an epic introduction that explains just how fucking awesome these two clubs are and what they were able to do in just two years.

listitem.para: Why it was important that ACM & FSG officially join forces
Why they need to remain officially separate and distinct groups
Add photo of FSG founding officers
